title: I need help riot, but where are you?
body:
So, I have had a persisting issue with the game but haven't found a place to report it. So in my desperation I have come here. 

Today I was playing a game with a friend, everything was going good until someone called my house. Now, I don't know what causes it to happen but my internet shuts itself off when someone calls and I get disconnected. When I reconnect, I am left in the fountain just standing in the center of the platform. I can watch everything that is happening in real time, see the chat but I cannot send messages in the chat. I also cannot move, cast spells or buy items. It is as though I am spectating even though I am in game. It says I have reconnected but as I said, I can do nothing. 

I also have a problem with the reporting of issues, there is no button to report issues. I know there was at one time because I have used it in the past. I see this as a very large inconvenience. I understand it was probably removed because of grievers and trolls, but it really takes away from the assistance of those who need it. 

I sincerely hope that Riot will see this and take it into consideration. 

With utmost digression, Bvitamin12

replies.body:
Hiya! 

For something like this, I would suggest filling out a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Player Support will have various ways to troubleshoot the issues you're having.

>Now, I don't know what causes it to happen but my internet shuts itself off when someone calls

You've got dial-up. The same lines used for your internet are also used for your phone.
